Class gc_HyperspaceBoundingBox

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.software.reuze.gc_HyperspaceBoundingBox
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable

    public class gc_HyperspaceBoundingBox
extends Object
implements Serializable

    HyperBoundingBox implementing a bounding box object in the multidimensional space.

    Author:
    Wolfgang Baer - WBaer@gmx.de
    See Also:
